comments.text:
Created attachment 561416
Sample triggering bug

I have received and accepted an invitation at 8.30AM PST. I am at CST and my Lightning is configured to Europe/Paris, so the invitation should show up at 5.30CST. However, when I accepted the invitation, it showed up at 8.30AM on my calendar.

Note: I have configured my Lightning timezone after receiving the invitation but before accepting it.

I have done some more testing about this.

* Actually, the invitation is registered correctly (i.e. the alarm seems to display at the CST time) but displayed incorrectly.

* Also, if I change the timezone, restart TB, and only then accept the invitation, it works correctly.
